amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.__. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used for the use of military force against Libya.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds for the use of military force against Libya.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Amash amendment (A038) Failed by recorded vote: 199 - 229 (Roll no. 514).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Amash amendment (A038) Failed by recorded vote: 199 - 229 (Roll no. 514).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A038) offered by Mr. Amash.
